name: Wormholes!
description:
This is a Platformer + Shooter mashup (with very few levels) but with a great twist: wormholes!

Due to time constraints it has VERY FEW levels at the time! Please wait for more!

Instructions

Play with keyboard (A, D and W + mouse) or with gamepad (joysticks, A to jump and shoulder buttons). Go through the tutorial!  Note that if you have a controller connected, it will enable the controller by default.

Try to speedrun while grabbing all stars!

Credits

  • Graphics: most by Kenney (free assets)
  • Sounds: freesounds.org
  • Music: original music 'Memories' by Maroon 5. Interpretation was played by me on my grand piano.
